required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: REN-Project 2 Cigarette and E-cigarette Nicotine Content and E-liquid Flavors
clinical_study.official_title: Project 2: The Impact of Cigarette Nicotine Content, E-cigarette Nicotine Content, and E-cigarette Flavoring on Smoking Behavior

brief_summary.textblock: Project 2 will evaluate the impact of very low nicotine content cigarettes, e-cigarette nicotine content, and e-cigarette flavoring on cigarettes smoked per day, nicotine exposure, puff topography, discomfort/dysfunction, other health-related behaviors, nicotine/tobacco dependence, biomarkers of tobacco exposure, intention to quit, compensatory smoking, other tobacco use, cardiovascular function, and perceived risk. Project 2 will also evaluate differences between conditions in compliance with product use and the ability to abstain from cigarette smoking when provided a financial incentive for abstinence from combusted tobacco. This is not a treatment program for smoking.

secondary_outcome.description: Measure of ability to abstain from smoking

other_outcome.measure: Number of choices to smoke in preference assessment task

other_outcome.description: Measure of relative reinforcement and substitution

other_outcome.measure: Center for Epidemiologic Studies Depression Scale
Environmental and Social Influences on Tobacco Use Questionnaire
other_outcome.description: Measure of smoking and vaping context
Measure of smoking and vaping topography
Measure of tobacco use, alcohol use, and drug use
Measure of perceived personal health risk

arm_group.arm_group_label: NNC cigarette + moderate nicotine e-liquid + cigarette flavors
arm_group.description: Participants are provided with normal nicotine content tobacco Spectrum Cigarettes along with moderate nicotine level e-liquid cartridges and can choose from cigarette e-liquid flavors.

arm_group.arm_group_label: NNC cigarette + low/0 nicotine e-liquid + cigarette flavors
arm_group.description: Participants are provided with normal nicotine content tobacco Spectrum Cigarettes along with very low or nicotine-free nicotine level e-liquid cartridges and can choose from cigarette e-liquid flavors.

arm_group.arm_group_label: NNC cigarette + moderate nicotine e-liquid + variety flavors
arm_group.description: Participants are provided with normal nicotine content tobacco Spectrum Cigarettes along with moderate nicotine level e-liquid cartridges and can choose from cigarette and non-cigarette e-liquid flavors including tobacco flavors.

arm_group.arm_group_label: NNC cigarette + low/0 nicotine e-liquid + variety flavors
arm_group.description: Participants are provided with normal nicotine content tobacco Spectrum Cigarettes along with very low or nicotine-free nicotine level e-liquid cartridges and can choose from cigarette and non-cigarette e-liquid flavors including tobacco flavors.

arm_group.arm_group_label: VLNC cigarette + moderate nicotine e-liquid + cigarette flavor
arm_group.description: Participants are provided with very low nicotine content tobacco Spectrum Cigarettes along with moderate nicotine level e-liquid cartridges and can choose from cigarette e-liquid flavors.

arm_group.arm_group_label: VLNC cigarette + low/0 nicotine e-liquid + cigarette flavors
arm_group.description: Participants are provided with very low nicotine content tobacco Spectrum Cigarettes along with very low or nicotine-free nicotine level e-liquid cartridges and can choose from cigarette e-liquid flavors.

arm_group.arm_group_label: VLNC cigarette + moderate nicotine e-liquid + variety flavors
arm_group.description: Participants are provided with very low nicotine content tobacco Spectrum Cigarettes along with moderate nicotine level e-liquid cartridges and can choose from cigarette and non-cigarette e-liquid flavors including tobacco flavors.

arm_group.arm_group_label: VLNC cigarette + low/0 nicotine e-liquid + variety flavors
arm_group.description: Participants are provided with very low or nicotine-free nicotine content tobacco Spectrum Cigarettes along with very low nicotine level e-liquid cartridges and can choose from cigarette and non-cigarette e-liquid flavors including tobacco flavors.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Age 18+
2. Daily smokers who have tried electronic cigarettes
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Unwilling to use research cigarettes or electronic cigarettes as part of the trial
2. Recent use of illicit drugs (except marijuana)
3. Breath alcohol level > 0.01 (g/dL)
4. Pregnant, trying to become pregnant or breastfeeding
5. CO reading >80 ppm
6. Systolic BP below 90 mm/Hg or greater than or equal to 160 mm/Hg
7. Diastolic BP below 50 mm/Hr or greater than or equal to 100 mm/Hg
8. Heart rate lower than 45 bpm or greater than or equal to 105 bpm
9. Inability to independently read and comprehend the consent form and other written study materials and measures.
10. Conditions in which participation is likely to post a significant threat to health or for which the condition could interfere with the ability of the participant to fully participate
